newsArray.title: Ex-captain Sourav Ganguly's message to India selectors: Take Auqib Nabi to England
newsArray.description: Sourav Ganguly has backed Jammu and Kashmir pacer Auqib Nabi for national selection following his stellar Ranji Trophy final performance. Nabi's five-wicket haul and league-leading 60 wickets this season have earned him praise, with Ganguly suggesting a call-up for the 2026 England white-ball tour.
creator: willow sports

newsArray.title: Ravi Shastri To Have Stands Named After Him At Wankhede Stadium, Gates For Sardesai, Solkar And Edulji
newsArray.description: Wankhede Stadium will name a stand after Ravi Shastri and gates after Dilip Sardesai, Eknath Solkar, and Diana Edulji, honouring their contributions to Mumbai and Indian cricket.

newsArray.title: IPL 2026 season delayed, new start date set for March 28
newsArray.description: The IPL 2026 season is set to begin on March 28, following a slight delay due to pending election dates in key states. The IPL Governing Council will finalize the schedule soon, addressing logistical and safety concerns, especially for RCB's home games.
creator: balaram menon

newsArray.description: India will next face the West Indies in a crucial T20 World Cup Super 8 tie on Sunday and Sanju Samson is expected to play a pivotal role.

newsArray.title: Ranji Trophy Final: Why J&K Pacer Auqib Nabi Dar Could Make India’s Test Squad? Explained
newsArray.description: Jammu & Kashmir pacer Auqib Nabi Dar led the Ranji Trophy 2025/26 with 60 wickets, guiding J&K to their first final. His consistency, swing mastery, adaptability, and useful lower-order batting make him a top contender for India’s Test squad.
creator: hrishikesh damodar

newsArray.title: 2026 T20 World Cup - Gautam Gambhir, Suryakumar Yadav's Blank Cheque To Abhishek Sharma: "I Love This Team..."
newsArray.description: Abhishek Sharma's impressive 55 off 30 balls against Zimbabwe marked his return to form in the T20 World Cup 2026, following a difficult start with multiple ducks. Abhishek expressed gratitude for the unwavering support from teammates, captain Suryakumar Yadav, and coach Gautam Gambhir during a challenging period.
creator: sajal k patra

newsArray.title: MI Junior Nagpur 2026: Akanksha Bari’s 7-Wicket Haul Powers South Public School To 10-Wicket Win
newsArray.description: Akanksha Bari starred with a remarkable 7-wicket haul and an unbeaten 29 as South Public School crushed Delhi Public School by 10 wickets in the MI Junior Girls U-15 tournament in Nagpur.

newsArray.title: India vs West Indies T20 World Cup Stats: टी20 वर्ल्ड कप में एक दूसरे के खिलाफ कुछ ऐसा रहा है भारत बनाम वेस्टइंडीज का प्रदर्शन, यहां देखें आंकड़े
newsArray.description: टीम इंडिया इस टूर्नामेंट में मजबूत बल्लेबाजी और संतुलित गेंदबाजी के साथ उतरी है. सूर्यकुमार यादव शानदार फॉर्म में हैं और टीम के लिए लगातार रन बना रहे हैं. वहीं गेंदबाजी में कुलदीप यादव और अर्शदीप सिंह ने अहम भूमिका निभाई है. दूसरी ओर वेस्टइंडीज की टीम भी विस्फोटक बल्लेबाजी के लिए जानी जाती है. निकोलस पूरन और शिमरोन हेटमायर जैसे खिलाड़ी मैच का रुख बदलने की क्षमता रखते हैं, जबकि महीशा जोसेफ और ओबेड मैककॉय गेंदबाजी में अहम साबित हो सकते हैं.
keywords: भारत बनाम वेस्टइंडीज बारिश का पूर्वानुमान
india vs west indies t20 tickets price
भारत बनाम वेस्टइंडीज टी20 टिकट की कीमत
india vs west indies t20 all match
india vs west indies t20 semi final
creator: siddharth raghuvanshi
